tests.name: TanStack Query Hooks API Error Handling creates ApiError with status and details
TanStack Query Hooks API Error Handling uses fallback error message when data.error is missing
TanStack Query Hooks API Error Handling uses data.error message when provided
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflows fetches workflow list successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflows includes workflow metadata
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflows filters workflows by search query
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflows filters workflows by namespace
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflows sorts workflows by name
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflows combines multiple filters
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflows uses different cache keys for different filters
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowDetail fetches workflow details successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowDetail handles 404 errors
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowDetail can be disabled with enabled option
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowExecutions fetches execution history successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowExecutions supports pagination filters
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowExecutions applies default pagination values when not provided
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowExecutions applies default pagination when filters is undefined
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowExecutions supports status filtering
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowExecutions does not add status parameter when status is undefined
TanStack Query Hooks useExecutionDetail fetches execution details successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useExecutionDetail handles 404 errors
TanStack Query Hooks useExecuteWorkflow executes workflow successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useExecuteWorkflow handles execution errors
TanStack Query Hooks useExecuteWorkflow handles schema mismatch errors
TanStack Query Hooks useDryRun performs dry-run successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useDryRun returns validation errors for invalid workflow
TanStack Query Hooks useDryRun includes execution plan with parallel groups
TanStack Query Hooks useTasks fetches available tasks successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useTasks includes task schemas
TanStack Query Hooks Utility hooks usePrefetchWorkflowDetail prefetches workflow data
TanStack Query Hooks Utility hooks useInvalidateWorkflows calls invalidateQueries
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDetail fetches task details successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDetail includes task schemas and HTTP config
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDetail handles 404 errors
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDetail can be disabled with enabled option
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskUsage fetches workflows using a task
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskUsage supports pagination
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskUsage includes workflow metadata
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskExecutions fetches task execution history
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskExecutions supports pagination
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskExecutions supports status filtering
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskExecutions includes execution details
TanStack Query Hooks useExecuteTask executes task successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useExecuteTask handles execution errors
TanStack Query Hooks useExecuteTask includes output data on success
TanStack Query Hooks useExecuteTask invalidates task execution history on success
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowDurationTrends fetches duration trends successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowDurationTrends parses date strings to Date objects
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowDurationTrends can be disabled with enabled option
TanStack Query Hooks useWorkflowDurationTrends is disabled when name is empty
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDurationTrends fetches task duration trends successfully
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDurationTrends parses date strings to Date objects
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDurationTrends can be disabled with enabled option
TanStack Query Hooks useTaskDurationTrends is disabled when name is empty
TanStack Query Hooks usePrefetchTaskDetail prefetches task data
WorkflowList Rendering renders WorkflowFilters component
WorkflowList Rendering renders workflow cards after loading
WorkflowList Loading State shows loading skeletons while fetching
WorkflowList Loading State hides loading skeletons after data loads
WorkflowList Default Filters applies default search filter
WorkflowList Default Filters applies default namespace filter
WorkflowList Default Filters applies default sort filter
WorkflowList Filtering filters workflows by namespace
WorkflowList Filtering filters workflows by search query
WorkflowList Filtering shows empty state when no results match
WorkflowList Sorting sorts workflows by name by default
WorkflowList Sorting sorts workflows by success rate when selected
WorkflowList Grid Layout renders workflows in a grid layout
WorkflowList Namespace List extracts unique namespaces from workflows
WorkflowList Error Handling shows error message when fetch fails
WorkflowList Accessibility has proper ARIA roles and labels
WorkflowList Last Updated Timestamp displays last updated timestamp after data loads
WorkflowList Last Updated Timestamp does not display timestamp while loading
WorkflowList Keyboard Shortcuts focuses search input when "/" key is pressed

WorkflowList Workflow Count Display displays workflow count after loading
WorkflowList Workflow Count Display displays correct count with filters applied
WorkflowList Workflow Count Display does not display count while loading
WorkflowList Edge Cases handles rapid filter changes gracefully
WorkflowList Edge Cases handles empty workflow list gracefully
WorkflowList Edge Cases handles single workflow result
WorkflowList Clear Filters Button displays clear filters button when filters are active
WorkflowList Clear Filters Button does not display clear filters button when no filters are active
WorkflowList Clear Filters Button displays filter count badge showing number of active filters
WorkflowList Clear Filters Button clears all filters when clear button is clicked
WorkflowList Clear Filters Button counts only non-default filters (excludes default sort)
WorkflowList Accessibility should not have accessibility violations
WorkflowList Accessibility should not have accessibility violations with filters applied

WorkflowCard Rendering renders workflow description
WorkflowCard Rendering renders namespace badge
WorkflowCard Rendering renders task count
WorkflowCard Rendering renders success rate with percentage
WorkflowCard Rendering renders total executions
WorkflowCard Rendering renders average duration

WorkflowCard Success Rate Badge renders warning variant for medium success rate
WorkflowCard Success Rate Badge renders destructive variant for low success rate
WorkflowCard Never Executed State renders "Never executed" text when lastExecuted is undefined
WorkflowCard Never Executed State shows 0 executions
WorkflowCard Never Executed State shows N/A for success rate

WorkflowCard Click Interaction has pointer cursor when onClick is provided
WorkflowCard Click Interaction does not have pointer cursor when onClick is not provided
WorkflowCard Click Interaction is keyboard accessible when onClick is provided
WorkflowCard Duration Formatting formats milliseconds
WorkflowCard Duration Formatting formats seconds
WorkflowCard Duration Formatting formats minutes
WorkflowCard Number Formatting formats large execution counts with commas
WorkflowCard Number Formatting formats small execution counts without commas

WorkflowCard Success Rate Trend displays downward trend with arrow

WorkflowCard Success Rate Trend applies red color for downward trend
